title: Elf wo Karu Mono-tachi (Those Who Hunt Elves)
synopsis: Loudmouthed martial artist Junpei Ryuzouji, elegant actress Airi Komiyama, and cheery but artillery-obsessed student Ritsuko Inoue all find themselves transported from their homeland of Japan to an unfamiliar, magical world. When the elven priestess Celcia Marieclaire casts the spell to send them home, she is interrupted, and the spell is broken into parts that scatter throughout the world. The spell fragments imprint themselves onto the skin of various elves.
related_anime: ['Elf wo Karu Mono-tachi', 'Elf wo Karu Mono-tachi II']
